 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׂ‎</span> **verb** ==spread out, spread== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרַס‎</span> (rare), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parašu***</u></abbr>, ***fly*** (derived species; properly ***spread*** [wings]); see also [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZA i. 417</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Lam.1.10|Lam 1:10]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֫‎</span> [[Job.11.13|Job 11:13]]; [[Ruth.3.9|Ruth 3:9]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרשֹׁ‎</span> [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]] +; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּפְרשֹׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.17.19|2Sam 17:19]], etc.; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרֵשׂ‎</span> [[Prov.29.5|Prov 29:5]] etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֻשׂ‎</span> [[Joel.2.2|Joel 2:2]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרוּשָׂה‎</span> [[Hos.5.1|Hos 5:1]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֻשׂוֺת‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.54|1Kgs 8:54]] — 

**1.** ***spread out*** a garment (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂמְלָה‎</span>) [[Judg.8.25|Judg 8:25]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> person [[Deut.22.17|Deut 22:17]] — wings [[Deut.32.11|Deut 32:11]]; [[1Kgs.6.27|1Kgs 6:27]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּנְפֵיהֶם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Sta|Sta]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Jer.49.22|Jer 49:22]] (fig), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Jer.48.40|Jer 48:40]]; [[1Kgs.8.7|1Kgs 8:7]] = [[2Chr.5.3|2Chr 5:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Job.39.26|Job 39:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעְלָה‎</span> [[Exod.25.20|Exod 25:20]]; [[Exod.37.9|Exod 37:9]] wings omitted [[1Chr.28.18|1Chr 28:18]] and perhaps [[2Chr.3.13|2Chr 3:13]] (strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּנְפֵי‎</span> [[BDB#Be|Be]]); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָיו אוֺרוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Job.36.30|Job 36:30]] ***spread out*** writing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> Pers. [[2Kgs.19.14|2Kgs 19:14]] = [[Isa.37.14|Isa 37:14]]; [[Ezek.2.10|Ezek 2:10]] sail [[Isa.33.23|Isa 33:23]] fishingnet, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמֶרֶת‎</span> [[Isa.19.8|Isa 19:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location); net (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶשֶׁת‎</span>) as snare, figurative [[Hos.5.1|Hos 5:1]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location), [[Ps.140.6|Ps 140:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרַגְלַי‎</span> [[Lam.1.13|Lam 1:13]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Hos.7.12|Hos 7:12]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Ezek.12.13|Ezek 12:13]] = [[Ezek.17.20|Ezek 17:20]]; [[Ezek.19.8|Ezek 19:8]]; [[Ezek.32.3|Ezek 32:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעְֲָֿמָיו‎</span> [[Prov.29.5|Prov 29:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפַּיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> in prayer, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַל‎</span> [[Exod.9.29|Exod 9:29]]; [[Exod.9.33|Exod 9:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Kgs.8.38|1Kgs 8:38]] = [[2Chr.6.29|2Chr 6:29]]; [[Ezra.9.5|Ezra 9:5]]; [[Job.11.13|Job 11:13]], +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Ps.44.21|Ps 44:21]], +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.22|1Kgs 8:22]] = [[2Chr.6.13|2Chr 6:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה‎</span>), [[1Kgs.8.54|1Kgs 8:54]], no complem. [[2Chr.6.12|2Chr 6:12]] of almsgiving, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפָּהּ פָּֽרְשָׂה לֶעָנִי‎</span> [[Prov.31.20|Prov 31:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing, [[Lam.1.10|Lam 1:10]] of enemy's greed (si vera lectio, see [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); ***spread out*** = display <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּכְסִיל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרשֹׁ אִוֶּלֶת‎</span> [[Prov.13.16|Prov 13:16]]. 

**2.** ***spread*** covering over [[2Sam.17.19|2Sam 17:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָסָךְ‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפְּֿנֵי‎</span> of thing), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּכְבֵּר‎</span> over (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) face of another [[2Kgs.8.15|2Kgs 8:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּנָף‎</span> ***skirt***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Ruth.3.9|Ruth 3:9]]; [[Ezek.16.8|Ezek 16:8]] (figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּגֶּד‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[Num.4.7|Num 4:7]]; [[Num.4.8|Num 4:8]] :[[Num.4.11|Num 4:11]]; [[Num.4.13|Num 4:13]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְמָ֑עְלָה‎</span> v6; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּסוּי‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing v[[Num.4.14|Num 4:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהָֿאֹהֶל‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿמִּשְׁכָּן‎</span> [[Exod.40.19|Exod 40:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַר פָּרֻשׂ עַלהֶֿהָרִים‎</span> [[Joel.2.2|Joel 2:2]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמָסָךְ‎</span> [[Ps.105.39|Ps 105:39]]. — [[Mic.3.3|Mic 3:3]]; [[Lam.4.4|Lam 4:4]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַס‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָר֑שׂוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.17.21|Ezek 17:21]] ***they shall be scattered*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְכָלרֿוּחַ‎</span>; [[Ezek.34.12|Ezek 34:12]] read probably ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן נִפְרָשׂוֺת‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺת‎</span>-, Hä [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]; on emendation of context see especially Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפֵרַשׂ‎</span> [[Isa.25.11|Isa 25:11]] etc. ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפָרֵשׂ‎</span> v11, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפָרֵשׂ‎</span> [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]] ***Infinitive cstr*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֵשׂ‎</span> [[Ps.68.15|Ps 68:15]], suffix<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרִשְׂכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.1.15|Isa 1:15]] — 

**1.** ***spread out:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפַיִם‎</span> in prayer [[Isa.1.15|Isa 1:15]]; [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]] so with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַיִם‎</span> [[Ps.143.6|Ps 143:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span>), and of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> entreating people [[Isa.65.2|Isa 65:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיוֹן בְּיָדֶיהָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Lam.1.17|Lam 1:17]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***spread out*** hands as in swimming [[Isa.25.11|Isa 25:11]], and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַיִם‎</span> omitted) v[[Isa.25.11|Isa 25:11]]. 

**2.** = ***scatter***, (?) subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with accusative of person [[Zech.2.10|Zech 2:10]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבַּצְתִּי מִ֖‎</span>, yet see [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]); [[Ps.68.15|Ps 68:15]], in doubtful connection.
